alert.note: Alert for Berks; Lehigh; Northampton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 2:15PM EST until February 04 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 4 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Total ice accumulations up to around a tenth of an inch are expected. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Morris and Warren Counties. In Pennsylvania, Northampton, Lehigh and Berks Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 4 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Be prepared for slippery conditions on area roads and walkways. Postpone travel if possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will transition to freezing rain Friday morning. The freezing rain is forecast to transition to sleet and snow before ending late on Friday afternoon. Little snow accumulation is expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
